mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (p_no, b_no, P_NAME_KO, P_NAME_EN, P_SIZE, P_BRAND, P_MODEL_NO, P_RELEASE_PRICE, P_CATEGORY, P_CLASS, P_STOCK) values(seq_PRODUCT.nextval, #{b_no}, #{P_NAME_KO}, #{P_NAME_EN}, #{P_SIZE}, #{P_BRAND}, #{P_MODEL_NO}, #{P_RELEASE_PRICE}, #{P_CATEGORY}, 'brand', #{P_STOCK} )
